system@link.description: Link to the system producing the observations

outputName.description: Name of the system output feeding this datastream

procedure@link.description: Link to the procedure used to acquire observations (e.g. methodology used by human operators)

deployment@link.description: Link to the deployment during which the observations are/were collected

ultimateFeatureOfInterest@link.description: Link to the ultimate feature of interest (only provided if all observations in the datastream relate to the same feature of interest)

samplingFeature@link.description: Link to the sampling feature (only provided if all observations in the datastream relate to the same sampling feature)

observedProperties.description: List of observed properties included in this datastream

parameters.description: Parameters applying to all observations in this datastream. Must be valid according to the parameters schema

phenomenonTime.description: Time extent spanning all phenomenon times of observations in this datastream

phenomenonTimeInterval.description: An indication of how often feature of interest properties are observed

resultTime.description: Time extent spanning all result times of observations in this datastream

resultTimeInterval.description: An indication of how often observation results are produced

live.description: Flag indicating if the datastream is currently streaming data
